item.title: Computerized biometric frequency modeling used to detect and compile mathematically designed disease, staging and diagnostic biomarkers
item.description: Computerized biometric frequency modeling used to detect and compile mathematically designed disease, staging and diagnostic biomarkers

item.title: Human BioAcoustics® Our bridge between the ancient ideas of sound healing and the futuristic Star Trek.
item.description:
Human BioAcoustics® Our bridge between the ancient ideas of sound healing and the futuristic Star Trek. 

Everything that happens to the body reaches the brain as biofrequencies that are then sorted, routed and assigned an interpretation but it seems, in modern times, that we carry very little conscious awareness of this information. Did we as a human race forget, or were we politically forced to abandon, a great deal of our intrinsic abilities that allow us to glean information about another person simply by hearing their voice?
